function.name: web_search
function.description: Perform a web search and return relevant results or summaries.

query.description: The search query to perform on the web.

function.name: read_file
function.description: Read the contents of a file from the local filesystem. Supports reading specific line ranges and different encodings.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to read.

start_line.description: Optional: The line number to start reading from (1-indexed).

end_line.description: Optional: The line number to stop reading at (inclusive).

function.name: write_file
function.description: Write content to a file on the local filesystem. Can create parent directories and backup existing files.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to write.

content.description: The content to write to the file.

create_dirs.description: Whether to automatically create parent directories (default: true).

backup.description: Whether to create a backup of the existing file (default: false).

function.name: edit_file
function.description: Edit a file by searching for a pattern and replacing it with new content. Supports both string and regex matching.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to edit.

search.description: The text or pattern to search for.

replace.description: The text to replace the matched content with.

regex.description: Whether to use regex for searching (default: false).

all.description: Whether to replace all occurrences (default: false, only first match).

function.name: search_file
function.description: Search for a pattern in a file and return all matching lines with their line numbers and positions.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to search.

pattern.description: The text or regex pattern to search for.

regex.description: Whether to use regex for searching (default: false).

case_sensitive.description: Whether the search should be case-sensitive (default: true).

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 100).
